segments.text: Just whose fault is this damage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The order was in good shape when it left out factory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It certainly didn't arrive here that way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll make it right with you , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about taking the damaged portion at a lower price ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of price did you want ?
segments.speaker: S2
